key_terms.term_description: Current Rate on Line (ROL) for each layer
key_terms.rationale: Rates are at the higher end of market benchmarks, especially for Layer 1 at 18% ROL

key_terms.term_description: Exclusion for named storms entering Gulf of Mexico prior to attachment
key_terms.rationale: Significantly restricts coverage for a high-risk region in the cedent's portfolio

key_terms.term_description: Limited reinstatements with increasing pro-rata premiums
key_terms.rationale: Reduces flexibility in managing catastrophic losses, especially in Layer 2 and 3
Provides more operational flexibility compared to previous 14-day requirement
Provides mutual protection and transparency in case of significant financial changes

premium_rate.target: 15% ROL for Layer 1, 10% for Layer 2, 7% for Layer 3
premium_rate.minimum: 16% ROL for Layer 1, 11% for Layer 2, 8% for Layer 3

gulf_storm_exclusion.target: Remove exclusion or limit to storms with confirmed Gulf entry trajectory
gulf_storm_exclusion.minimum: Exclusion only for storms with sustained winds over 100 mph entering Gulf

reinstatement_provisions.target: Two free reinstatements for all layers
reinstatement_provisions.minimum: Two free reinstatements for Layer 1, one at 100% pro-rata for Layer 2

special_termination.minimum: Maintain current terms with mutual agreement

claims_notification.minimum: 30-day notification period with reasonable extensions possible

concessions.concession_item: Accept slightly higher ROL in Layer 3
concessions.rationale: Lower-risk layer with more predictable losses

concessions.concession_item: Agree to portfolio concentration risk mitigation plan
concessions.rationale: Shows proactive approach to managing Southeast exposure

key_points: Potential inflation impact on reconstruction costs
Need for competitive yet sustainable treaty terms

proposed_modifications.current_language: Layer 1: 18% ROL, Layer 2: 12% ROL, Layer 3: 8% ROL
proposed_modifications.proposed_language: Layer 1: 16% ROL, Layer 2: 10% ROL, Layer 3: 7% ROL
proposed_modifications.justification: Aligns more closely with current market benchmarks while reflecting our risk management capabilities

proposed_modifications.current_language: Losses from named storms that have entered the Gulf of Mexico prior to attachment are excluded
proposed_modifications.proposed_language: Exclusion applies only to named storms with sustained winds over 100 mph entering the Gulf, with pro-rata coverage for lesser storms
proposed_modifications.justification: Provides more nuanced coverage while addressing reinsurer's severity concerns

proposed_modifications.current_language: Cedent agrees not to increase exposure in high-risk zones by more than 15% without prior notification
proposed_modifications.proposed_language: Cedent will provide a detailed risk mitigation and diversification plan for Southeast exposure, with quarterly updates and risk reduction strategies
proposed_modifications.justification: Demonstrates proactive risk management beyond simple exposure limits
